author: Helene Braun, AI Boost
title: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF Generating More Revenue Than its Flagship S&P 500 Fund
description: The iShares Bitcoin ETF (IBIT) has a higher fee structure, allowing it to outpace the  S&P 500 fund (IVV) despite not having anywhere near as much in assets under management.
content:
BlackRocks iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) is now generating more revenue than one of the asset managers most iconic products, the iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV), according to Bloomberg data.
